page.title: 07Auctioneering-Gloucester
page.content: Mr.Lawrence is an auctioneer at Gloucester{Cattle Market}and works for Bruton Knowles Co/J.Pearce Pope and Sons.He has been working as an auctioneer for 28 years and started when he was 20 years old.He followed his Grandfather and Father into auctioneering and did not want to do anything else. On Mondays and Thursdays when Mr.Lawrence goes to Market he gets up at 6.45am to arrive at 8.00am.In an auctioneering room he sells cows,pigs sows,sheep and lambs.The busiest times are Spring and Autunm.As an auctioneer he has to know the value of the animals,what each farmer is looking for,whether they have enough money to buy what they are bidding for,and when a person is bidding eg.nods,winks or other signs.The rest of the week he goes to farms valuing and selling.
